document.full_text: boston bruins defenseman andrew ference has been fined $2,500 for making an obscene gesture to the crowd during game four against the montreal canadiens, the nhl said on friday.
document.title: bruins' ference fined $2,500 for obscene gesture
lines_and_colors: boston bruins defenseman andrew ference has been fined $2,500 for making an obscene gesture to the crowd during game four against the montreal canadiens, the nhl said on friday.
